name: CRITEO (USA)
notes:
To peer we ask for the following: 

- a publicly routable ASN 
- publicly routable address space (at least one /24) 
- ASN record completed in PeeringDB 
- 24x7 NOC contact capable of resolving BGP routing issues 
- Presence at one or more Internet Exchanges or Private peering interconnection facilities listed here on PeeringDB 

In order for you to receive all our routes, you will need to peer with us in at least 2 different locations (and at least one on each of the following groups): 

Group #1: 
- NYIIX 
- Telx New York

Group #2: 
- Equinix Palo Alto

Related ASNs: 
Criteo also manages the following ASNs:  44788, 53031, 55569 

Peering Requests: 
Contact peering@criteo.com 

Peering Operational Issues: 
Contact noc@criteo.com 24x7
